list.name: Chloroplasts
list.definition: The organelle that is the site of photosynthesis

list.name: Grana
list.definition: The stacks of thylakoids in a chloroplast

list.name: Stroma
list.definition: The fluid portion of the chloroplast outside the thylakoids

list.name: Proton Pump
list.definition: The enzyme that pumps protons into the thylakoid space

list.name: ATP
list.definition: The energy currency of the cell. Made from ADP and a phosphate group.

list.name: Acidic
list.definition: Has more protons in it. Thing on the pH scale.

list.name: Light dependent
list.definition: These types of reactions happen inside the thylakoid

list.name: 6CO2 + 6H2O + Light = C6H12O6 + 6O2
list.definition: The equation for photosynthesis. Use an equal sign to separate reactants and products.
